Summary: dark cloud moving, zig zaged, very loud, vibrated everthing, headach sick stomach watering burning eyes
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Johnson City
There were no other sightings in Johnson City on or around August 28th 2013
divs: sighting detailsfirst heard a distant roar, walked outside to see a dark grey and black cloud about 3\4 mile to the east. moving towards me the sounds got louder to the piont of hurting my ears, eyes stared burning and watering. the tears ran down my face. felt like evrything was vibrating even when i touched a swingset in my backyard. cloud changed direction and turned south. head started hurting. cloud traveled south for aprox 1\2 mile then turned towards the west for maybe 300 yards then turned south and went off in the distance. as it went further away the noise and vibration faded. resulted in burning eyes, tearing up a lot, extreme headach and sick to my stomach. hole thing lasted aprox 20 minutes. 12:00noon to 12:20pm. its now 9:50 pm and i still have a headach.
